column1: Dorgannas Iaur was a book of lore written by Torhir Ifant. The book contained an "account of the shapes of the lands of old"
column2: and Ã†lfwine quoted from it in his translation of the Quenta Silmarillion to clarify the placing of the realms of Beleriand.

column1: Dorgannas Iaur is likely a Sindarin name
column2: apparently meaning "shaping of the lands of old" and consisting of dor ("land") + cannas ("shaping") + iaur ("old").

column1: Category:Books and documents within the legendarium
